metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: •  Share - Shares the Bulk Send along with its status with the user email you provide.  Shared web forms can be viewed on the Manage page, but do not allow editing.

Note: Allow Embedded high privilege JavaScript™ and Privileged system operations only  for sources that you trust and work closely with. For example, use these options for  your employer or service provider.  6. Select OK.

•  Actions menu (blue square) - This section contains all of the actions you can take  regarding the Bulk Send (parent template). Click the See More link at the bottom right  of the section to see all values:

Note: To specify the line width, color, and other properties before you draw, select the  desired tool, and press Ctrl+E to open the properties toolbar. Set the desired options in the  Properties toolbar.
Specifies the prefix added to the image filenames if you have several versions of the same  image file. Filenames assigned to images have the format filename_img_#.
Access a document where you previously used the AI Assistant to generate responses to your  queries. The document opens as before, with the full chat history and any associated follow- up questions.

•   Arrange objects: To move an image or object in front of or behind other elements. You  can push an item forward or back on just one level. Alternatively, you can send it to the front  or back of the stacking order of elements on the page.
Note: To deselect an image and start over, click outside it.    2. Right-click the image and select copy. Once done, you can paste it to a new file or a
